taskbody.context: You may run into some problems during Spring Break if you aren't caerful in your planning. The following are questions that you may have during your vacation:

step.cmd: What if I run out of money? If you run out of money, call your parents.

What if I get bored? To avoid boredom or down time during Spring Break, make sure you plan ahead. Bring all the items that will allow you to do what you want during break and even more. Bring extra things to do in case you have extra time.
What if I forget my pillows and blankets? Extra pillows and blankets are inside the home, just in case.
